summary: Simply changes the angle of the sword to be more vertical.
descriptionHtml:
I didn't like the almost 45 degree angle of the one handed sword in vanilla Skyrim, so I changed it. No other weapons were changed. This mod will conflict with any mod that changes the skeleton files for characters.

This mod was made for personal use, I do not intend to update this further, though I'll take ideas into consideration.

Special Thanks goes to Bethesda, andÂ Helen Lee for showing me how to do this. Enjoy :)
author: Aren Liore
